entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: The heir of Slytherin is mentioned in the context of a sorting hat song. The text does not explicitly state who the heir is, but it implies that Harry Potter might be the one.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is described as a phoenix and is mentioned to have healing powers through its tears. It is also stated that Fawkes took flight again in a whirl of gold and scarlet.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story. He is mentioned to have healing powers through phoenix tears on his arm.

relationships.description: Riddle was pointing Harry's wand at Fawkes.
Fawkes took flight again in a whirl of gold and scarlet to protect Harry Potter.
Riddle dropped the diary into Harry's lap.
Harry seized the Basilisk without thinking.
